localBankOnramp.title: Local Bank Onramp to On-chain Address
localBankOnramp.description: Integrate a local banking system to allow users to easily convert fiat to crypto and transfer funds to their on-chain address.
tasks: Establish partnerships with local banks.
Develop API integrations for fiat-to-crypto conversions.
Ensure compliance with local regulations (KYC/AML).
Test the onramp system with a closed beta group.

dashboardDevelopment.title: Dashboard Development
dashboardDevelopment.description: Build a user-friendly dashboard where users can monitor balances, perform transactions, and track farming strategies.
tasks: Design the UI/UX of the dashboard.
Develop backend infrastructure to support real-time data feeds.
Integrate wallet connections (e.g., MetaMask).
Ensure compatibility with mobile and desktop devices.
Conduct user testing.

communityBuilding.title: Community Building
communityBuilding.description: Foster a community around the product by engaging early adopters, developers, and enthusiasts.
tasks: Launch social media campaigns and create content (blogs, tutorials).
Set up a Discord or Telegram channel for real-time engagement.
Host AMAs, webinars, and online events to educate and build trust.
Develop a reward mechanism for community contributions (e.g., feedback, bug reports).

farmingStrategiesImplementation.title: Farming Strategies Implementation
farmingStrategiesImplementation.description: Introduce farming strategies that allow users to earn rewards by staking or providing liquidity.
tasks: Research and develop multiple farming strategies.
Ensure contracts are optimized for security and efficiency.
Provide documentation on risks and expected yields.
Integrate farming options into the dashboard.
Educate users on how to participate in farming through tutorials.

auditFinancialProtocols.title: Audit of Financial Protocols
auditFinancialProtocols.description: Conduct a thorough audit of the financial protocols to ensure the security and stability of the system.
tasks: Hire a reputable third-party auditing firm.
Ensure all smart contracts and financial mechanisms are audited.
Implement any required fixes or optimizations.
Share audit reports publicly for transparency.

goLiveMVP.title: Go Live with MVP Customers
goLiveMVP.description: Launch the MVP (Minimum Viable Product) to a select group of early customers.
tasks: Onboard early adopters and partners.
Monitor usage, gather feedback, and make iterative improvements.
Set up customer support systems for MVP users.
Ensure the MVP is stable and performs under real-world conditions.

goLivePublic.title: Go Live Public
goLivePublic.description: After fine-tuning the platform based on feedback from MVP users, launch the product publicly.
tasks: Launch a full-scale marketing campaign across multiple channels.
Provide detailed tutorials, support, and onboarding for new users.
Monitor user metrics and address any post-launch issues promptly.
Begin developing new features and scaling infrastructure.
